name: HighRise Rampage
description:
This game was created for Ludum Dare 51 - Jam.

This is a top down shooter where you need to get from one elevator to the other. You will have 10 seconds to do this.

Along your way there will be obstacles that you need to destroy with your weapons. 

Can you get to the end ?

Controls
  • WASD - Movement
  • Left Click - Shoot Weapon
  • Right Click - Throw Grenade
  • Esc - Pause Menu
Credits:

Programmer: Syvier - https://twitter.com/Syviery

Art: Zyger  - https://twitter.com/ZygerDesigns
